about_the_game:
"Haunting Record: Phantom Street" is a walking simulator infused with elements of horror and suspense. You find yourself on a street both unfamiliar and strangely familiar, where eerie events unfold one after another. Restless spirits linger here, their resentment palpable, as if waiting to drag you into the abyss… Can you escape their grasp as the terror and unknown draw ever closer, or will you succumb to their call…?

Gameplay:

The core gameplay revolves around identifying anomalies. If everything appears normal, turn left; otherwise, turn right.

Features:

This game isn’t just about spotting anomalies—it also includes intense and thrilling chase sequences, as well as immersive "Pool Core" scenes that delve into the inner world.

Step by step, you will uncover the truth...

content_descriptors.notes: In the game, there will be scenes where characters die unexpectedly (such as leaving a bloody body after a car accident), with a large amount of blood.
